Name: Old Fashioned Caddy
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange slice & skewered Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
STRAIN into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice).
Review: Rich, red and packed with flavour.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2005 by Wayne Collins in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Old Fashioned Caddy contains 209 calories
